body:
Hey avi-wombats! (I feel jozzy now!)

Kylo and I are very likely going to do a youtube livestream in around 5-6 hours of coding. I'm looking into two-camera livestreams and it's quite possible both of us will be showing our screen while talking to each other on teamspeak.

Please leave your ideas of what we should do in this thread.

Hopefully this will run smoothly and kylopepes will rule the world.

Have fun!
body_tagged:

Please leave your ideas of what we should do in this thread.

Hopefully this will run smoothly and kylopepes will rule the world.

Have fun!
title: KyloPepe (or JaviCode!)Developing Livestream!

replies.body: What your every day/most common process involving the server.
replies.body_tagged: What your every day/most common process involving the server.

replies.body:
Some things me and friends would love to be changed:
  • 1.8 bug fixes
  • Update to 1.8 to fix block-lag
  • /whitelist on scrim servers
  • Maybe /kick on scrim servers?
  • Fix the intense lag on scrim servers
  • Fix trail particles, it's gone when you die and it comes back when you relog
  • Better YAML for CTW
  • Fix bug on throwback that you can't see it while the server is up
  • More badges and trails
  • New leaderboards
Thanks for Zero and Boxeh for the extra suggestions!
